price: 11. Yang demikian itu karena Allah Pelindung bagi orang-orang yang beriman; sedang orang-orang kafir tidak ada pelindung bagi mereka.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَوۡلَى ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَأَنَّ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ لَا مَوۡلَىٰ لَهُمۡ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: dhālika bi-anna al-laha mawlā alladhīna āmanū wa-anna al-kāfirīna lā mawlā lahum
